title: Live in this Great Community in Southwest Austin!
posting_body: Get a taste of true Austin living at this brand new community without compromising on style or comfort!
Located in southwest Austin, this community is conveniently next to Southwest Parkway and Highway 290 for quick access to any destination in Austin.
Enjoy abundant living spaces, exquisite amenities, and our serene SW Austin neighborhood.

You'll love relaxing in your designer one, two, or three-bedroom apartment home after a day exploring nearby greenbelts or sampling the world-renowned restaurants and boutique stores in downtown Austin, just a 10-minute drive away.
Private screening room featuring surround-sound and stadium seating
E-lounge with high-speed Internet and iMac station
Resident lounge with catering kitchen & HDTV
Infinity-edge pool with baja sun shelf and cabanas
Fire pit & grilling area with panoramic city views
Multiple pool-side grilling and dining stations
One and two, and three-bedroom spacious living plans
Gourmet chef kitchen with stainless steel appliances
Custom cabinetry and large kitchen islands
Computer niche, dry bar and built-in bookshelves*
Spa-inspired bathrooms with large soaking tub
Ample bedrooms that accommodate king-size beds
Full-size washer/dryer combo in each home
Don't miss out on this community, call today to schedule your showing!
Matt Davidson ~over 28 years of leasing experience in Austin~
I have access to over 1000 listings, and can help you with all your renting needs!
FREE SERVICE TO YOU, NO FEES!
